description: A shoot-em-up inspired by the classic Galaxians game. Repel waves of invaders using your gun turret. Manage the temperature of the turret to avoid overheating and watch your ammo level to avoid running out in the later levels.

License: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)

longdescription: A shoot-em-up inspired by the classic Galaxians game. Repel waves of invaders using your gun turret. Manage the temperature of the turret to avoid overheating and watch your ammo level to avoid running out in the later levels.
